title: a new champion idea for support
body:
what about like an elemental Savior:
W can spawn bushes with 2 hp bars (max 3)
Q can fire a skill shot from all bushes to root the enemy.
E shield ally with a summoned bush absorbs magic and physical dmg.
R destroyed all bushes to heal an ally with a HoT and enemies attacking the that ally with be slowed and damage is reduced.

replies.body: hmmm. sounds cool. maybe give the champ a passive which makes the champs more powerful/stats. the more bushes spawned.? idk
